BR.name: 3D Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master
BR.description: O inimigo declarado de Joe Musashi, Neo Zeed, retornou! Controlado pelo Shadow Master, um formidável ninja clonado da própria linhagem de Joe, o sindicato mantém a cidade prisioneira com a sua cruel organização criminosa. Use armas mortais e artes ninjas letais para enfrentar as hordas de bio-ninjas e salvar sua cidade! Além da sua novíssima apresentação 3D, 3D Shinobi III apresenta um Modo de Seleção de Nível e uma configuração de controles personalizável que permite que você atribua cada ação a botões específicos.

CA.name: 3D Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master
CA.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.

MX.name: 3D Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master
MX.description: ¡Los archienemigos de Joe Musashi, los Neo Zeed, han regresado! Controlado por Shadow Master, un ninja formidable, clonado a partir del mismo linaje que Joe, el sindicato mantiene a la ciudad cautiva con su malvado círculo criminal. ¡Utiliza armas letales y mortíferas artes ninja para enfrentarte a las hordas de bio-ninjas y salvar la ciudad! Además de sus nuevos gráficos en 3D, 3D Shinobi III contiene un modo de selección de rondas y una opción de control personalizable que te permiten asignar cada acción a botones específicos.

US.description: Joe Musashi’s sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe’s own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. Utilize deadly weapons and lethal ninja arts in order to stand against the hordes of bio-ninja and save your city! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Shinobi III features a Round Select Mode and customizable input setting which allows you to assign each action to specific buttons.
